org.pircbotx.hooks.managers
Interface ListenerManager<E extends PircBotX>

All Known Implementing Classes:
GenericListenerManager, ThreadedListenerManager
public interface ListenerManager<E extends PircBotX>

Manages everything about Listeners: adding, removing, and dispatching events to appropriate listeners.

An important job of all methods in this class is to absorb and report any exceptions or errors before they reach PircBotX. Failure to do so could break many internal long running operations. It is therefor recommended to catch Throwable and report with PircBotX.logException(java.lang.Throwable)

Performance is another important job in implementations. Events can be dispatched very quickly at times (eg a /WHO on all joined channels) so lots of expensive calls can hurt performance of the entire bot. Therefor important methods like dispatchEvent(org.pircbotx.hooks.Event) should be as fast as possible

Author:
Leon Blakey

Sends event to all appropriate listeners.

For implementations: Please read important information on exception handling and performance.

addListener

boolean addListener(Listener listener)
Adds an listener to the list of listeners for an event.

For implementations: Please read important information on exception handling and performance.

Parameters:
listener - The listener to add
Returns:
True if the listener was succesfully added, false if not

removeListener

boolean removeListener(Listener listener)
Removes the specified Listener

For implementations: Please read important information on exception handling and performance.

Parameters:
listener - A Listener to remove
Returns:
True if the listener was removed, false if it didn't exist or wasn't removed

listenerExists

boolean listenerExists(Listener listener)
Checks if the specified listener exists

Parameters:
listener - The listener instance to look for
Returns:
True if it the listener exists, false if it doesn't

getListeners

Set<Listener> getListeners()
Gets all listeners that are in this ListenerManager

For implementations: Please read important information on exception handling and performance.

Returns:
An Immutable set of all listeners that are in this ListenerManager
